suggest.meta_keywords: Personal Tokens, Azion Console, API authentication, CLI commands, secure authentication, token expiration, create personal token, token scope, manage personal tokens, Azion API
suggest.meta_description: Learn how to create and manage Personal Tokens in Azion Console for secure API and CLI access, with details on expiration, scope, and security.

current.meta_description: Personal Tokens are a string of characters used to authenticate your user and access to certain interfaces and tools.
